Reviews.Title: Great  buy for those who want the very least of connections and options.
Reviews.Author: James R. Mull
Reviews.Content: This is a great television, don't get me wrong. But, with only one HDMI port and no audio out ports at all... it is quite limited. How would one connect a sound bar or an external speaker to boost the almost loud enough sound?Also the USB port that is described as 3.0 will not accept video... how is that possible in 2013?Other than those particulars, I am happy with the unit and would recommend it for those who want LG quality at a bargain price, with only the very basic of features.It is a truly beautiful TV... was simple to assemble and set up without reading the instructions.I will be adding a 3 port HDMI switch and using a Blu-ray player to provide a USB port that will play video.Update: Its been 6 months now...and no issues. Having added the $14 switch and the Blu-ray player... the TV now meets all my needs...except for not being loud enough sometimes.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased, I don't care about extra frills on a TV - 47 INCH 47LN5200
Reviews.Author: Yarii
Reviews.Content: Amazon has lumped all the different sizes under one review format. The TVs, no matter which size, are basically the same model from LG, but depending on screen size, the features on the back are different. For instance, some are saying only 1 HDMI.....that all depends on which size TV you order. I purchased the 47" and it has 2 HDMI ports.  It's best to go to the LG web site to check and make sure what your model actually has on it.Here is what is on the back of the 47" 47LN5200:2 HDMI-In Ports - one on side, one on back1 USB-In Port - on side1 Optical Digital Audio Out - on backAntenna In / Cable In - on backAudio In - on back - red and whiteComponent In - green, blue, red (video Y, blue Pb, red Pr)This is NOT a Smart TV.TV is easy to set-up. How often can a female lift and carry a 47" TV without help?  Certainly not in the old days with the CRT types of TVs.  You can wall mount this with the Vesa 400 x 400 or use the included stand which feels strong and secure. Tighten 7 screws and you're ready to go. This also comes with one extra screw that will go through the stand (into wood) if you choose to anchor this TV to a table made of wood. The stand does not swivel.Picture quality is very good with sharp, bright colors. It's a 60 Hz refresh rate, not 120 Hz like TV's priced higher, but since I don't watch many sporting events, this doesn't matter to me. Although I did briefly watch a football game and saw a little blurring on the edges of the players when they show close-up, fast-moving plays.The screen isn't a dull matte finish, but it's not glossy either. Just perfect, I see no glare in daylight or at night when I have a lamp on.The speakers are a little tinny-sounding on the treble, but once I accentuated the bass more, they sound OK. Certainly not theatre-quality, but I plan on running my stereo through the TV eventually. It's nothing so horrendous that is worthy of knocking my rating down to 4 stars.Regarding USB, you can connect a flash drive or an external hard drive to the TV, but you can only use it for photos or music. You cannot play movies stored on these devices. It supports .jpg and .mp3 only.A 31 page printed manual comes with it, but you also get a CD that has the full 62 page manual.I think it's a wonderful TV considering the price (it was $399 when I bought it, but the Amazon pricing flucuates daily). It has everything I want on a TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV once calibrated.
Reviews.Author: MGB
Reviews.Content: This TV has a pretty average picture till you calibrate the image.  Please use the settings below for best picture settings.(For RGB sources. YCbCr source values are stated to the right)Picture mode: Expert 1Backlight: 56 (same with YCbCr [no "PC" input label] )Contrast: 95 (same with YCbCr)Brightness 53 (same with YCbCr)H sharpness: 11 (10 with YCbCr)V sharpness: 24 (17 with YCbCr)Color: 53 (same with YCbCr)Tint: G4 (same with YCbCr)Picture Options:Black Level: Auto (same with YCbCr)Expert Control: (all same with YCbCr. Use "Copy White Point Values" for IRE)Dynamic contrast: OffColor Gamut: WideEdge enhancer: OffGamma: 2.2Whitepoint:Color Temp: Warm1Color Management System:Red: Saturation -1 Tint -3 Luminance 0 (same with YCbCr)Green: Saturation 1 Tint 2 Luminance 0 (same with YCbCr)Blue: Saturation 2 Tint 18 Luminance 0 (same with YCbCr, except Tint is 23)Cyan: Saturation 5 Tint 2 Luminance 0 (same with YCbCr)Magenta: Saturation 4 Tint -1 Luminance 0 (same with YCbCr)Yellow: Saturation 10 Tint 1 Luminance 0 (same with YCbCr)For those complaining about sound, who would buy a TV like this and use the internal speakers.  Most TV speakers are the weakest point of any set and using a reciever with speakers you can hook up as many HDMI devices and have one HDMI cable from the reciever to the TV negating the lack of inputs on the TV itself.  You get far better sound, dont have to worry about lack of inputs and most recievers have built in video scalers to sharpen up the picture.  The sound has far more impact than the image itself and it amazes me people buy large flat screen TV's and still use the built in speakers which can't even come close to portraying the entire frequency range.  HDMI cables can be bought cheap at sites like Monoprice dot com for about 4.00 each and for the cost of the TV you can buy a reciever with six or more HDMI inputs and a pair of good speakers with a built in video scaler.  Ive given you the calibration settings so use the money you would've spent on calibration and buy a reciever.

Reviews.Title: Great 42" 1080p LED TV from LG
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: Great 42" 1080p LED TV from LG for just under $400.As it is 60Hz (not 120Hz), it may not be great for sports, but for everyday/office usage, it is perfect.A couple qualms about the device:1) 1 HDMI out in the back, not side of the device. Could use at least one or two more.2) The back of this device is not perfectly flat (as you will find with most modern TVs, to make it readily mountable with any universal TV mount)!I ran into a little problem where I purchased a universal tilting wall mount for this TV and the mounting arms had to be cut down to size in order to fit into the curvature of the back of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Looks Great!
Reviews.Author: Jonal T Coleman
Reviews.Content: I got this for a great black friday deal for $448.  Simple to setup and it looks great.  If you want to make it a smart TV just get a Chrome cast dongle and you are good to go.  The trade for such a low price is the limited features.  But like i said, all you need is the Chrome Cast.

Reviews.Title: Television
Reviews.Author: Vee
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture. Has a vibrant colour. Crystal clear picture. Great size. Looks great. Good sound.Great television for an excellent price. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV..
Reviews.Author: Steve K "nine11c2"
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Don't be scared off by the lack of HDMI inputs. First, many of the reviews are incorrect there are TWO HDMI ports.  One is on the back of the TV, the other on the side of the TV for plugging in a video box. The side plug is perfect for Chromecast.  Second, if you need more than two HDMI inputs, you can get a switcher with remote control for $10 here on Amazon.  I did. It works with Chromecast, Blue Ray and games.And the 60Hz?  I watch all kinds of shows and sports. I've NEVER seen anything wrong with any picture.  It is a clear crisp picture, pretty bright and it seems bigger than the 50" it is.This TV is a tremendous bargain!

Reviews.Title: Great tv but not the best for sports
Reviews.Author: Alon W Cooper
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with tv visually and its audio, but if you are into sports the refresh rate (60 hz) wont help your viewing pleasure.

Reviews.Title: I am very happy
Reviews.Author: Robert Taylor
Reviews.Content: When I was ready for a larger TV, I checked a few providers and found Amazon offered me the best deal for the money.  It turns out to be the right decision.  The picture quality is great.  Set up was very easy too.

Reviews.Title: Questionable Hardware
Reviews.Author: Orane R. Grandison
Reviews.Content: Two days after arrival the TV stopped working, there was sound but only colourful vertical lines on the screen.Amazon was willing to take the TV back, but since I live outside of the USA it would have been too costly for me to ship it back into the country. Instead I did some research, called LG support and found a replacement part (T-CON board) on amazon for $14 - this fixed the problem (for now).The TV itself is great in terms of video and such. But the whole experience left me very uncomfortable. I don't know what caused the failure on the T-CON board and I am concerned that it may occur again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent HD all around value!
Reviews.Author: Truth Teller
Reviews.Content: This is for the 47" model. First, I have been on the high end side using the JVC RS-1 among other projectors and enjoyed quality on big screens 100" or so. Was interested in the Panasonic Plasmas but they are gone and was concerned about the contrast of a set like this. The numbers are apparently almost impossible to find although one site claimed a high number.That aside, all the discussion of HDMI ports and audio are truly sideshows. If you want more than two HDMI ports, a quick visit to buy a three port (automatic) adaptor is dirt cheap. I run one that way so only use HDMI port and it's one button control over everything using a Harmony remote. Audio? It's adequate, but I use a Rotel receiver with an old set of Paradigm Reference 20 speakers on stands and mute the internal audio.A friend has a 47" Sharp Aquos model from a few years back and it's a nice picture but I don't enjoy the artificial screen door effect. As this is a 60hz model, that's no issue. Motion blur? I don't know what anyone would complain about. Basketball, football, soccer, ice hockey, I've yet to see it. YMMV.Running this with one HDMI port on a Mac Mini. Everything looks very good.The level of performance at this price point shows frankly the HD industry has entered commodity status with a very good picture available for a very low (decent) price. Are their better options? Sure, especially if you are set on wifi internal to your HD TV device. Are there better pictures on other sets? Probably depending on personal taste but you get a lot of bang for your buck on this and clearly this model is already being phased out for the 120 hz models and if you don't like the soap opera effect well here's an inexpensive option.This picture is quite enjoyable and setting up one of the inputs to the listed settings on this thread is very impressive.

Reviews.Title: Bare bones TV with great picture
Reviews.Author: Miles Lindgren
Reviews.Content: I decided to go with this TV because I wanted the best value TV with minimal frills. I use my TV with Chromecast and hooked to my laptop so I didn't want Smart TV, and I don't care about 3D in particular.  Assembly of the base and initial setup were easy, and the picture was good right away.However, the difference in content quality becomes a lot more important with a large TV like 50 inches. I had come from a 32" TV, where it was easy to watch low quality broadcasts. From a similar viewing distance, the low quality is a lot more apparent on the larger TV.That said, with HD content the picture quality is stunning. I sat and re-watched BBC's Life in Blu Ray and a few other favorites. Great picture quality is all I had hoped for with this TV, and that's what I got.I can think of just one small gripe. There is no 3.5mm audio output! Or any analog output at all. This means you're stuck with optical output only. I fortunately have an external DAC/receiver with optical, but those without are stuck with the tinny built in speakers.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: krista mcmanus
Reviews.Content: It's everything we were hoping for in a TV!  Picture is clear, sound is great and the vivid color is wonderful!!

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: B Happy,Fish "WJP"
Reviews.Content: At first I thought this was a dummy model because it is so so light.  It is replacing a 50in plasma that weighs 100lbs. and this TV feels like it weighs 20lbs.  Without much plastic framing the screen it looks much smaller too.  I had to get out the measuring tape to make sure it was 50 inches.  Screen size was the same as my old plasma.  The picture is nice and bright after i went into the menu and took it off energy saver mode.  With energy saver on it was rather dim and lifeless. First impression of the sound quality was that it sounded cheap, like something you would expect from a no name TV, but after playing with the sound controls I am happier with the sound quality.  Not 100% but it wouldn't keep me from buying it again.  Inputs are a little messed up.  There are only 2 hdmi inputs, one is on the back and one is on the side. I would rather have seen everything in one location but I can live with that. It's just not my way of thinking, it's someone else's idea of what is right.  For the low price and good picture I think this TV is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant Pix....I love this TV.
Reviews.Author: John F Larkin
Reviews.Content: What a great TV for a very reasonable price.  The 42" size is perfect for my "man Cave".  The HD is great.  The compaints I had read re: sound/volume are NOT what I am experiencing.  Perfect for me....I highly recommend LG electronics.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Torrey Reusser
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for the waiting room of our medical practice.  Although it's mounted in a west facing room with windows, it is bright enough to see without any overpowering glare.  The colors are nice and easy to adjust and the TV was light enough that i was able carry it up the ladder and hang it on the wall mount by myself.  There are only a couple HDMI inputs but that doesn't limit us and I think most users would be using a switched source like an receiver anyway.  There are no built-in web apps, but again that doesn't matter to us.  If you need a TV that's for a public viewing area or don't need the TV to be the device that streams Netflix this a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: cheryl craig
Reviews.Content: Giving 5 stars! Great picture & size. Was a gift for my hubby for Christmas and he loves this TV!

Reviews.Title: Died after 2 months
Reviews.Author: Brittany Book
Reviews.Content: The tv was great".. For 2 months, then went dead. No idea what happened. I Won't buy an LG again.

Reviews.Title: great tv for price
Reviews.Author: jon hoover
Reviews.Content: nothing fancy just a TV.. but easy programing, and worked with Comcast remotes with no programing.... awesome picture and great sound without any addons

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mark Vanderson
Reviews.Content: For the money can't be beat. Clear picture, easy set up, great sound.  Have purchased other LG products and have always been more than satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great Basic name brand set at a fair price
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: I purchased to 50 inch during cyberweek for a great price at $448.  This TV is everything I wanted and has met my expectations.  I did not need a smart tv as I have other devices I use for those functions, there's only 2 HDMI inputs on the 50 inch but I knew that when I got it so no biggie there.  The picture is super clean and the set itself is very light, as to be expected from a LED TV.  The picture calibration tool is very usefull, just make sure you do it in your normal viewing condtions, as I found myself redoing it in the evening rather than the morning when I initially did it.  I could barely notice the 60hz refresh as an issue either as some say, sunday football looked amazing!!.  Also, make sure someones home when its going to be delivered as they (thankfully) won't just leave it at your door...they also beat their expected arrival date by 5 days!  Overall, I'd buy this LG set again even at normal price, its a great value for a standard 1080p LEDTV.

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 47LN5200 47-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV
Reviews.Author: Paula Pilmanis
Reviews.Content: What can I say . . . we love this TV. It was an amazing price and has a great picture. The sound is OK but you can't add extra speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Maguire
Reviews.Content: Great price. Great picture quality. Sound is good too. only one HDMI slot but that was clear when I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Great picture - low cost - hard to beat
Reviews.Author: Rusty_In_OR
Reviews.Content: High quality at a low cost - great picture, easy setup.  This is a terrific TV at a very surprising price-point.

Reviews.Title: Knock Me Out
Reviews.Author: In-Sight "20/20"
Reviews.Content: this TV is amazing...The picture in vivid is like 3D...Setup a breeze and sound when adjusted great...Fast and economical shipping.. This is a must have for anyone looking for their first HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: joshua small
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing. Crystal clear picture, and amazing sound. Very thin and light considering the size. I would of rated five stars if it had more than just two HDMI ports, but nothing that a HDMI splitter can't fix. Other than that I'm more than happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: Debbie Van Etten
Reviews.Content: TV is everything it promised in the advertising!  We are waiting to hook up the cable but have watched several DVD's on it.  The picture is amazing!!  LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Title: Good quality TV  for the price. No super extra bells and whistles - just a good generic TV.
Reviews.Author: k.c.s
Reviews.Content: I own this TV and while I did not buy it via amazon I bought it locally on sale for the same price in the $460 range. Overall, it is a very good TV for the price and a big upgrade from my last TV which was probably one of the last beastly Sony 40"WEGA tube TV's they made. Compared to that TV which was a beast at about 120+lbs this LG one weighs in at a quarter of my old one which took 2 people to move. I have had no problems with it and set up was easy and fast.  It has a very good quality picture (on CINEMA setting via HDMI), and like has been said by others it does have a minimum number of inputs. Sure this can be a challenge if you need to add a DVD, DVR, XBox etc etc..but who cares about plugging and unplugging a few cables every now and then - not me - and if I really cared I would get a central unit or would have planned for that but I was planning for a good TV for the price - not for 50 different inputs. For connections it has RCA/Composite, HDMI (2 HMDI - one rear and one on the side) and your standard BNC for cable. The USB is also available but seems for photo & music mostly from the input selector.  Sound/speakers are a little "basic" in audio, and at low volume it sounds a bit thin, but it can get pretty loud and fill out for sound when you boost the level. Menu is easy to operate and the  Overall for the price it is a nice TV and great for a bedroom or guest room. The screen can auto dim for night time viewing and it has the usual auto-timer and other basic features you would expect.  Doesn't skimp but it doesn't go crazy. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: 50LN5200, great picture, mediocre sound, minimal inputs.
Reviews.Author: monkeee2002
Reviews.Content: I bought the LG 50LN5200 at a local store. The picture quality is fantastic, but the speakers are pretty weak for a 50" tv.  It has an optical audio out, so a sound system will negate that problem.  The inputs are a bit lacking. 2 HDMI's, 1 component, 1 coax, 1 usb. I was using 2 component hookups on my previous tv, but upcoming upgrades will rectify this issue for me.  I give the picture quality 5 stars, audio 2 stars, connectivity 3 stars. It's a good deal for the price, providing you plan to use external speakers.

Reviews.Title: beautiful tv!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tyler Daczka
Reviews.Content: amazing picture! great sound! nice thin sleek design! i love my 47" lg! very clear picture even close up! astouding quality!

Reviews.Title: Got it as a gift
Reviews.Author: Deyna79
Reviews.Content: We got this for my MIL and she absolutely loves it. It is a nice picture and quality so I'm pretty happy we picked this one.

Reviews.Title: 60 Hz makes me warry
Reviews.Author: J Merolla
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV before it was discontinued and had it delivered for free.  I was nervous the 60 Hz would cause an issue with tearing however I have yet to see any instances where this TV does not perform as expected.  The colors are deep and overall I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible customer service - do not purchase
Reviews.Author: Hasan
Reviews.Content: I have used LG products in the past and purchased this TV in the hopes that I would get world class customer service. Unfortunately the experience has led me to make sure I never buy from LG ever again and that my friends and family should do the same.I bought the TV 4 months ago. Within 2 months it started showing a defect in the display panel (a white line going through the middle). I had a warranty so I requested LG to resolve the issue. They ordered a new display panel to my residence, and someone came and replaced it. The TV still didn't work which showed that clearly the flaw was somewhere else. However due to the bureaucracy of customer service, they said they needed to try a SECOND panel. I waited another couple of weeks without a TV, the LG team came and tried the second panel, it clearly didn't work.Now once again instead of using some common sense, they ordered a THIRD display panel to see if the same problem would be magically resolved this time.I've spent hours on the phone with customer service. I've had to get out of work and stay at home because they can only come during certain hours to 'repair' the TV. I've been without a TV for months now. Customer service refuses to acknowledge the irrationality of their actions - stating that 'it's not in their hands.'At this point I just want to get out of my misery - this company is certainly going downhill and in retrospect I should've gotten a Sony or Samsung instead.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Jim Morrison
Reviews.Content: Good price, fast deliver, free shipping. I'd recommend the LG over the ladder. The quality seems better. After my first big screen fried in under a year i tried LG having been happy with both my washer machine, and my cell phone. The tech speaks for itself.With some manufacturers out there, you're better off renting. Technically; its what you're doing when you have to rebuy the same tv every year for full price. And thats why i'd recommend this TV to you.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV Monitor
Reviews.Author: SteveC
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice TV too bad that all of the manufacturers discontinue their products very shortly after they hit the store shelves

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Cabby
Reviews.Content: Got this TV outside of Amazon on a ridiculous deal.  Picture is so clear and vivid without killing your eyes when calibrated correctly.  I have the WOW disc and actually found the built-in picture wizard to provide better picture for my taste.  The sound quality is profoundly worse than my Samsung.  I did get a sound bar to rectify the problem.  This is a simple "dumb" TV with fantastic picture which is exactly what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: LG DOES IT AGAIN!!
Reviews.Author: Marianne M Totin
Reviews.Content: LG does it again!  This is my 3rd LG TV and I can't find anything bad to say about it.  The price at Amazon was the best on this model and with no taxes or shipping, even better.The menus on LGs TVs are so easy and they are all the same from one model to the next.  This TV was super easy to set up & connect & go!  Even if you don't choose this model, consider LG.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Stark "schtink"
Reviews.Content: This TV is big, bright and vivid.  It is relatively thin and lightweight and has a very nice, sleek design.  Colors and whites show up very bright and vividly. Blacks can be a little washed out at times but that is to be expected with an LED LCD screen.  All my remotes work with this TV and it was really easy to set up.  I especially like that there aren't a bunch of unnecessary/annoying features.  I use a PS3 and an Apple TV to do most of my TV watching so I don't need the TV itself to do any of that stuff.  It also has minimal inputs/outputs which I also like.  Simpler is better.  The internal speakers can be turned up pretty loud and sound pretty good, although I use external speakers with everything most of the time.

Reviews.Title: satisfying monitor!
Reviews.Author: Julien
Reviews.Content: I am totally satisfied of this monitor which is worth is little price for such a size 49".The image is neat, and the color settings can easily bet set depending on your need (movie/game/energy saving/etc..)I am only giving out 4 stars because I was disappointed to end up with a 49" screen although it says 50" in the title.I understand it comes from the fact that a 49" TV is classified in the 50" category, but I would rather have this mentionned somewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Zamora
Reviews.Content: Gift for my mom, she loves it!  She still had one of those big, clunky tv's.  Now, we've brought her tv viewing experience to 2013.

Reviews.Title: No frills monitor with some blooming
Reviews.Author: Digital Reader
Reviews.Content: Got this as a deal from Amazon Warehouse and have no regrets - I use it as a large display for streaming internet content. As such, I didn't need a 'smart tv', and this is definitely not one. The image quality is actually quite good - the only issue is that there is some blooming that is noticeable when the screen is completely black (while watching 'Gravity' for example) - not an uncommon problem with LED TV, and certainly not distracting enough to offset the price-to-performance ratio.Bottom line is that it works for me because of my requirements and the deal I got on it - I won't pay full retail.

Reviews.Title: THIS TV IS GREAT BUY IT
Reviews.Author: Malick3
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV and it is a good TV. I don't regret buying at all. So go ahead if you want the latest technology

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 55LN5200 55-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV
Reviews.Author: kolo
Reviews.Content: LG Electronics 55LN5200 55-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV is a great tv to buy adding a Mx2 midnight box to it gives you the smartest tv your money can buy 10 times smarter than regular smart tv's on the world market

Reviews.Title: No Thank You
Reviews.Author: Tamara Ault
Reviews.Content: I went through all the hassle of mounting it to the wall for it to only work for a day. When I could get the tv to turn on, it would shut off after ten minutes. Now, the tv wont even turn on! So frustrating!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Linda G.
Reviews.Content: The color and picture in this tv is great.  Sound is clear got it at a huge discount for Christmas.  This was a good buy.  My husband and I enjoy this machine greatly. I love the ton of features it has.  I am really beginning to really love this brand.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV once using correct settings
Reviews.Author: Dazed207
Reviews.Content: I used the calibration settings MGB posted and the picture looks great. I'm using this as a PC monitor I watch movies and play games on the computer, This monitor is perfect for doing so. Thanks MGB for the settings.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture...No bells or whistles
Reviews.Author: C. O. Dickerson
Reviews.Content: Two HDMI inputs were enough for this new bedroom TV. I would not recommend this set for your living room surround sound theater sound component pic/mobile/Xbox/PS4/etc. needs. A DirecTV box and a DVR player is all I needed for my bedroom. That's two HDMI inputs...perfect! The lack of a star is due to the absence of a standard speaker plug. My prior Scepter 46" HDTV purchased here on Amazon 5 yrs ago had way below average TV sound quality. I bought a great pair of computer speakers and voila, sound problem solved. There is no sound plug on this set to plug in those same great speakers. Silver lining, the regular TV sound quality is serviceable, much better than the old Sceptre and it appears I can safely do without. There is an internal "surround sound" setting that I now use and it is more than serviceable quality sound for virtually all programs. If you want a great picture with no frills and don't mind good standard acceptable and clear sound, this is gold for the price.May 9, 2014 addendum -> There is a review by MGB on the ideal picture settings of this product. When you see the review you'll recognize the technical appearance. Find it. Follow his exact technical adjustment recommendations for this model. I did. The picture really is superior. It's better than what I eyeballed myself while using the very basic settings that all of us are pretty familiar with like contrast, brightness, backlighting etc. I also have an LG 55in 120mhz tru-motion more advanced quality set in my living room that's amazing. This guy's settings rival my 120 mhz advanced set picture quality. You're paying less for a 60mhz picture, but after the proper adjustments you won't be able to tell the difference from TV sets with much better specs. I love this thing.

Reviews.Title: TV IS FINE; REMOTE IS NOT
Reviews.Author: Colorado Gent
Reviews.Content: We are pleased with the TV:  fine picture, great resolution, HD is super.  Ordering, shipping and delivery went off without a hitch.  Crew that delivered it, had it unpacked and set up in about 30 mins.  We are on satellite, so getting going is always somewhat of a task:  first we activate the receiver or the TV (order does not matter), but each one has to be activated separately.  Channels are selected by the receiver remote, not the TV remote.  BUT the volume and mute are activated by the TV remote.  Its takes some getting use to, but the TV remote is designed for little children's fingers, not adults.  Small, small buttons that are crowded together so you cannot operate it by feel or familiarity; you've got to look for the button you want, and then be careful to push only it without hitting an adjacent button.  An annoyance, but a big for  me, as I am a constant user of the mute button.  Solution?  Buy a universal remote?  For $78 at Costco.  Maybe someone has a better solution.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic, UNBEATABLE Quality for the Price
Reviews.Author: JerT81
Reviews.Content: If you love HDMI ports, you might want to reconsider. If you only have a couple devices to hook up, you'll love it. One of my best, recent purchases.

Reviews.Title: lg 50inch
Reviews.Author: Jennifer McLintock
Reviews.Content: good picture quality.  I think t's good value.  my previous tv was very old so this is a real upgrade.  easy to program as t pretty well does it itself.  very pleased.  oly draw back is there are only 2 hdmi inputs.  otherwise excellent

Reviews.Title: Great clarity
Reviews.Author: Kim Jakubec
Reviews.Content: Love this tv.The size is perfect and the clarity is great. I would highly recommend it and especially through amazon where when it was shipped it was also hooked up

Reviews.Title: my second LG
Reviews.Author: ktkp
Reviews.Content: I love LG! I bought this and a 32 inch. The sound on this one really isn't that great. I would recommend getting a sound bar or surround sound. I would think with a 50 inch you would plan to do this anyways. I was a little disappointed with the quality of the buttons (not like I hardly ever use them). My 32 inch has touch buttons on the front and the quality is way better! These buttons are kind of old fashion and on the back of the tv (weird... maybe just me?).Anyways, I definitely recommend buying! The picture is great! I've been using it for about a month now, so I guess we'll see.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: Phoenixreview
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mom to replace old projection TV.  Huge difference !  Nice and bright, clear.  Easy setup.  Mounted it on swivll arm mount on table - so it's very nice to turn different directions in the room.  My mom (91) loves it.

Reviews.Title: LUV LG 47-in
Reviews.Author: Jonathan M.
Reviews.Content: I received product around Christmas and good price works great for me and i will recomend this brand to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: M Maxson
Reviews.Content: This TV has a beautiful picture and great sound, all a TV needs to be. I highly recommend this TV!

Reviews.Title: great tv picture is wonderful
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: worked better than the 49ers what a sorry display and the refs were the worst I have ever seen ever

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: L. McDowell "elefanlisa"
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Easy set up. The stand could be a little sturdier. The biggest complaint is the sound isn't very good for a tv that size.  I spent another $60 for an LG sound bar. Now I have great sound.

Reviews.Title: Simple things are best
Reviews.Author: David Crockett "pianomahn"
Reviews.Content: I expected this hdtv would be lacking a few things/only one composite video connection, so so sound, not a smart tv/  but for the price I couldn't be more pleased.  Great picture, easy input switching, two hdmi connections, lots of picture options including a "eco" function.  This tv is also very green using, according to the energy sticker, only $12 of electricity a year.  All this for a 55" screen and $600.

Reviews.Title: Everything we expected
Reviews.Author: Ami Hartwig
Reviews.Content: Picture is great.  We don't have HD so can't comment on that but we are happy with the purchase.  Speakers could be improved.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, and an amazing deal
Reviews.Author: Susan S. Wisseman
Reviews.Content: I go this on sale, and it blew me away at how quality it was for the price. Crisp clear picture and wonderfully small bezels. It's also surprisingly thin for the price. I would totally recommend this LG for anyone. It seems to me that the only way LG cut corners in this product is the stand, which just isn't as fancy is the pricier models but still doesn't look bad.

Reviews.Title: Good T.V. SO FAR
Reviews.Author: Carol McNeil
Reviews.Content: I chose this t.v. because it is led and the size that I wanted.I like the color resolution on this t.v..The LG seem to be a good t.v.

Reviews.Title: Just the right size
Reviews.Author: Kara Dawn Moore
Reviews.Content: Wonderful TV does what we hoped it would and has good picture quality.It's not too large and not small, just the right size. And was easy to set up as well.

Reviews.Title: We love our new LG 47-in TV!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Matthews
Reviews.Content: This TV was easy to program with our satellite company. (Of course it took two of us to lift and manuever it into place.) My hubby figured out the lighting contrasts after a day. We are not your usual TV watchers. We don't let our world revolve around what is on TV.  (We quit recording anything on a regular basis when we found ourselves looking at 6 months - 24/7 - of a program we loved.) The picture is clear and usually fills the complete screen.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture
Reviews.Author: George Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Amazing quality picture. Amazing price. Great brand. Very lightweight. Only bad is I personally use my tv also as a computer monitor so the tv doesn't have a direct rgb plug in. Need a seperate cable. Other than that the tv can't be better.

Reviews.Title: LG
Reviews.Author: phil
Reviews.Content: Christmas gift for son.....great replacement for a tv that shot craps after 10 years. Not all the bells and whistles.but the set views great

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Atul Gupta
Reviews.Content: I was about to buy a samsung models but it was costing me a $100 extra for the same features and size, Then luckily I saw this . Although this one is Used and initially I was hesitant to but this, but after reading some positive reviews I gave it a try. And I am satisfied now with my decision. The product came as described on website and works great. It is neat and clean. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: LG 47-inch LED TV
Reviews.Author: LeRoy P. Smith
Reviews.Content: We purchased the LG 47-inch LED TV because of the very good reviews we read,and the price for this TV was unbeatable. This TV has a picture that is extremely clear with vivid colors. This is the first LG TV we have purchased, but because of the quality of this TV we will be looking at LG products first when we need to purchase a TV again.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Cory hogan
Reviews.Content: This TV as an amazing picture, a simple remote, plenty of inputs including USB, and great value! It earns five stars easily!

Reviews.Title: Great price for the size!
Reviews.Author: sunshine
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this television for my parents for Christmas and they love it! It was a great find, price and the size that they had preferred.You can't go wrong with that!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Veronica Ham
Reviews.Content: Received the television 10 days earlier than expected. It only took a few minutes and it was up and running and I am not a techy person. Picture is beautiful so clear really happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Dan Ehle
Reviews.Content: Great value for a really nice TV, I have it hooked up to a Golden Tee arcade game but I've watched a few football games on it and it has a great picture.  Wish I had bought 2 to complete my man-cave.

Reviews.Title: 47 inch LG LED Television
Reviews.Author: Juanita B.
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the TV, but the base doesn't allow it to sit level.  I would definitely buy it again.

Reviews.Title: GOOD BUY!
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: IT WAS A GIFT FOR OUR DAUGHTER--SHE SEEMS TO LIKE IT VERY MUCH---WHEN WE VISITED IT DIDN'T SEEM TO HAVE AS BRIGHT A PICTURE AS I THOUGHT IT SHOULD HAVE---THAT MAY BE DUE TO NOT HAVING THE BRIGHTNESS ADJUSTED CORRECTLY.  OVERALL A GOOD BUY!!!

Reviews.Title: Great price & great picture
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Kirk
Reviews.Content: No issues what so ever with this TV. Easy to hook-up and crystal clear picture along with a very loud speakers.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Jane Harris
Reviews.Content: It was delivered on time.  It was easy to set up and the picture is awesome.  We are very happy with our new TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV so far
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Dodson
Reviews.Content: Fast Shipping.  Nice looking TV. Great picture. Easy TV setup. TV was as described. Love the 50 inch screen size.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: melvin
Reviews.Content: Great price  tv shows very well it was a gift for someone they love it  ... Thanks you .. B

Reviews.Title: Great set
Reviews.Author: Vaughn
Reviews.Content: Sharp picture and a great size and easy to set upStand was sturdy with out chance of falling over

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Toni A Kirwan
Reviews.Content: This tv rocks! Such a great value and looks great on the wall in my bedroom...only one hdmi but they have splitters for that reason. The best part is the virtual surround sound...I keep looking outside to see who's talking! :)

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Jason S.
Reviews.Content: It was everything I expected and more.  Can't even describe the picture quality. Easy to use.  And perfect size for my living room

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom t v!
Reviews.Author: Susan Keylon
Reviews.Content: Work's great, fast shipping. Use it where only one H D M I is needed. I also have 65" 3d LG smart tv. Both are great

Reviews.Title: Very good bangs for the bucks
Reviews.Author: MR E HUBIN
Reviews.Content: good image quality  for the pricevery easy to set-upI have also tested symplink with raspbmc and it works really well allowing to use the LG TV remote to control the XBMC on raspberry Pi which is great (you need a HDMI cable supporting ethernet - the basic amazon one does btw)only caveat: it only has 2 HDMI inputs which might be a bit short for those having a lot of external devices.

Reviews.Title: Good Price, Good Quality
Reviews.Author: Callie McDonald
Reviews.Content: I bought the 47 inch for only $399! Love it and such a GREAT deal for such a great TV!!

Reviews.Title: Great savings on Black Friday
Reviews.Author: D. Michael Medlin
Reviews.Content: I picked up two of these on Black Friday deals for about $445 each.  I used them at my office and have been pleased so far.  Being LED, they have a good range of viewing angles.  I didn't really need a thin form TV, so I was able to save some.  The whole office has been pleased with how they look.

Reviews.Title: wow awsome price
Reviews.Author: Alvaro Jaramilo
Reviews.Content: I got what I was looking for a good price. Its the right sizes for my room,it got the nice picture quality and a brand that I know and I can trust.

Reviews.Title: Value value value
Reviews.Author: MCC
Reviews.Content: Got this TV mostly because of value. Didn't want to wait 6 hours in line for black friday $300 50" class no name brand at Target. For about $150 more, it was delivered to my door and it is a LG. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles of more pricer TVs. For the price, it's the biggest bang for your bucks.  No problem yet after more than 1 month viewing. Got a 3 years insurance plan just in case.

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Would of liked to have more ports for hook ups but overall good TV for the price. Would recommend !

Reviews.Title: Want a TV? (And not sum SMURT Tea Vie!)
Reviews.Author: bradenbru
Reviews.Content: Excellent value, with a clear, vibrant picture, and plenty of settings to adjust to find your preferred picture.A couple of minor issues--it's thicker than I thought it would be (but not much), making wall mounting more difficult (but possible), and there are limited inputs for HDMI and Component devices. If you have a HD audio/video receiver with it's own inputs, the latter is a non-issue. Finally, the 60hz doesn't bother me, as I usually can't stand the motion enhancement on those TVs anyhow.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: B Dicky
Reviews.Content: Looks great! For the price you cannot beat this TV. Have a Roku to pair with it so that makes it very similar to having a smart TV but for less $

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Received this from my son for Christmas. It's our first flat screen High Def. TV. I am amazed at the picture quality. It is absolutely beautiful. My wife and I are not videophiles so the lack oh HDMI ports doesn't really bother us. Its not a smart TV so they got us a Sony Blue ray with Wi-Fi and that hooked up is very cool as well. Easy to set up, great picture no issues. Oh and I thought I would want a 120Hz tv because of sports, and to tell you the truth I don't see any issues as of yet. I guess the hardware they are using now is better than it used to be. It is a great TV all around and for the price would recommend highly!

Reviews.Title: Worth for the money!
Reviews.Author: Biju Nair
Reviews.Content: LG Electronics 47LN5200 47 - Inch  LED TV - Excellent Picture and sound quality. Overall it was a worth buy for $450

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Burton Runde
Reviews.Content: I am happy with this TV. It doesn't have a lot of frills but it was easy to set up and it has worked flawlessly. It is in a well lit room and has no problem being bright enough. It has a nice clear picture. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: I'll recommend this TV!
Reviews.Author: Hakeem
Reviews.Content: The TV is great and the Thots love to see it up on my wall... Shows a great picture all the time!!!

Reviews.Title: rating for LG tv
Reviews.Author: Billy Addison
Reviews.Content: i ordered this TV for my daughter and i like the LG maker. It fits into her living space very well

Reviews.Title: Great For Watching, Annoying For Gaming.
Reviews.Author: Dakota Pesce
Reviews.Content: The TV is HUGE! I got this TV mainly for watching. The color is amazing, and the brightness is perfect. My only issue is it has a half second lag on xbox 360. I use the xbox regardless because i use my DVDs mostly when watching, but for gaming i would not recommend. I tried playing battlefield 4, and dear god it's hard as heck to get a kill. WATCH OUT GAMER'S. Great TV otherwise tho!

Reviews.Title: Enjoying our new TV.
Reviews.Author: LEATHA ANDERSEN
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  It is everything I wanted for a great price.  I had problems with it only having 4 connectors.  So I needed to buy an HD cable, and a  blue ray player to see movies and Netflix.  So can become a domino effect to get set up but now is ok and we enjoy it every day.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Byrnes
Reviews.Content: Gave it as a Christmas gift and the family thinks it's outstanding. Would highly recommend to anyone interested in this product.

Reviews.Title: Was mine different????
Reviews.Author: a carter
Reviews.Content: Lots of reviews on here say only one HDMI port, mine has two....GREAT PICTURE!! Awesome T.V. at an Amazing price!!

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 42LN5200
Reviews.Author: EDER B NUNES
Reviews.Content: The TV is very good, the image definition is very good, but it need more inputs it has only 1 HDMI in put and 1 shared video composite and video component

Reviews.Title: lg tv
Reviews.Author: Barbara Dollar
Reviews.Content: Love my tv! Works perfect for my bedroom. Both my tvs are lg brand and I am very happy with them.

Reviews.Title: LG Electronic 50-inch, 1080p 60Hz LED TV
Reviews.Author: Bee Bee
Reviews.Content: I just received my TV & just what I wanted. It"s a great T.V., sounds great & has a very clear picture.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and easy
Reviews.Author: Andy H
Reviews.Content: Good, big tv for the money. Not a lot of whistles and bells, but a clear picture and uncomplicated operation

Reviews.Title: LG 50LN5200 50 INCH review
Reviews.Author: T. Seever
Reviews.Content: i purchased this TV because i have an old Samsung plasma that i wanted to put in my room and black friday/cyber monday was the perfect time for me to purchase a new TV. i purchased the 50" 50LN5200. and so far i'm not disappointed in my purchase.The TV has a nice crisp picture and the 60Hz refresh rate doesn't really bother me UNLESS i'm watching a scrolling ticker at the bottom of the news or SportsCenter. Then its slightly noticeable but . .i knew the refresh rate when i bought it and everything else is great.i don't know how the speakers sound because i hooked it to my stereo right away with the optical out cable and was in business. i have my Xfinity cable box and Xbox 360 hooked up to this via the 2 HDMI ports and both look great. did a little adjusting on the picture because this has an ECO mode that dims the screen. i didn't like it set like that so i changed it.overall. great TV for the price. nice clean, crisp picture with minimal bezel surrounding the screen with the only thing it really lacks is a higher refresh rate and a few extra HDMI ports but I knew about this when i bought it.

Reviews.Title: Met needs
Reviews.Author: orlando ward
Reviews.Content: Used primarily  for gaming (black ops, etc.) his tv does what's expected. Decent  speakers (small room) an good picture. It does seem to darken occasionally, fixed with channel change or an handling of remote. Maybe it some sort of energy saver.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good.
Reviews.Author: fastforwardgirl
Reviews.Content: I don't know a lot about TV's so when my brother in law recommended this TV I took his word for it. So far I'm very pleased with the TV. It was fairly easy to set up. I do wish there was more than 1 HDMI port, but I don't know if that's even something that TV's come with? The picture is clear, the sound is great (although we usually watch DVDs or Netflix through our blu ray player that comes with surround speakers so to be honest we don't use the TV's speakers that often). This was definitely what I was looking for in my price range and I'm very happy with it. It's a great size for us and while it's not HUGE, it's a perfect size.

Reviews.Title: LG 42N5200
Reviews.Author: wolfrover
Reviews.Content: Sorry to say>  this model is poorly made  Have had three from the store  on all of them the HDMI ports did not work  Someone in Quality control messed up!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Sdott1
Reviews.Author: Shawn Callender
Reviews.Content: It was a good buy the only thing I didn't line was the one HDMI port other than that if you just want it to watch TV great for that .

Reviews.Title: Poor shipping but otherwise great product
Reviews.Author: Russ Kirsch
Reviews.Content: First order I received had a massive hole in the box which led to a massive gash in the very center of the screen. Amazon was very good about the return and replacement though, and I received another 2 days later. As for the TV itself, couldn't be happier. Picture is bright and sharp, and as a new gaming TV I couldn't ask for more. As others have said however, if you are looking for a new centerpiece for your complex home theatre system this may not be the TV for you. It has a very limited number of inputs, and afaik only a single digital audio out.TLDR: Shipping caused a minor headache but if you're happy with just a few hdmi ports this is a great TV

Reviews.Title: lg 47 in 1080p 60hz led tv
Reviews.Author: Dylan L.
Reviews.Content: got this product about a month ago and its an amazing tv! Has 2 usb ports which helps out and has a great picture. For the price you just can't beat it. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: M. Strileckis
Reviews.Content: Outstanding picture clarity. Surprisingly good speakers. My only grip is that the stand is kind of shaky, but won't take off a star because I'm not sure if it was designed like this intentionally. The lack of HDMI ports disturbs me, but is manageable.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Bob "Bob"
Reviews.Content: This TV was dirt cheap.  The picture is nice.  It is only 60HZ, but unless you watch fast motion often, you probably won't notice any blurring or artifacts.  I have a plasma for sports, so I didn't care about this.  Unlike 1/3 of the reviews here, I actually researched what I was buying.  The only thing I notice it is possibly missing is the 3.5mm audio jack that it says it has on the spec sheet.  I see a port that fits the bill, but it says "service only."  I don't plan to use that, so I'm not worried, but I can see how someone who might have wanted that connection would be annoyed.  It's not as easy to find good calibration settings as with more popular TV's, but the picture wizard actually does a pretty good job.  Overall setup was quite simple.I also want to point out that I actually own the TV, which can't be said for several of the negative reviewers.Anyway, my wife is very happy with this TV and that's really all that matters.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: momdukes6
Reviews.Content: This tv is nice, easy to set up and shows great. Picture is great and color is wonderful. Buy it.

Reviews.Title: Broken in 26 days
Reviews.Author: quicksilver
Reviews.Content: After less than a month of use, half of the screen is broken. All of the pixels on one side of the screen would go black and then begin to lag behind the rest of the screen. Images that appeared on the rest of the screen would slowly "fade" onto the side and it would hold images frozen for several seconds.I'm very unhappy with LG and Amazon with this purchase. LG for obvious reasons but Amazon did a poor job of remedying the situation even though I am within the exchange period. Conveniently, the 50" version of this TV is no longer in stock, so, I cannot exchange for a new one. My only option is to get a refund. Nevermind the hours that I spent on Cyber Monday researching and deliberating over TV's only to settle on a lemon. I do not want a refund; I want a working product for the price that I paid.Not cool, Amazon. I will be making all future large appliance purchases in brick-and-mortar stores.

Reviews.Title: A SATISFIED CUSTOMER!!!!
Reviews.Author: caesar bansil
Reviews.Content: Very good product........very easy to assemble and install. The image is very bright, clear and crisp compared to the Westinghouse 40" TV that I bought last year for almost the same price. I definitely recommend this product....

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Igor Raspapanovichenvski
Reviews.Content: For the price, a great TV.  All plastic and not fancy looking like my prize 55" LG but for <$400 it is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Football on the patio
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Good product, fast shopping, easy set up- good sound and picture. I use it on my screen porch to watch football . Nice set up with a wall mount

Reviews.Title: good buy, nice picture, but limited features
Reviews.Author: zach olney
Reviews.Content: I got a great deal on this 42 inch. I am happy with the image quality. Blu ray looks amazing, football is crystal clear etc.However , the sound is very touchy. You either have to crank it up to hear dialogue or turn it down during any action or video game play.There aren't many settings that allow you to tweak things either.And the biggest issue I've had is the amount of inputs. Two HDMI ports, a USB port and RCA. That's basically it.Overall, I think it's a good product for basic home entertainment. But if you are a hardcore gamer, or are looking to set up a sound system with a lot of peripherals, you might want to spend a little bit more to get what you're looking for.

Reviews.Title: Piece of JUNK!!!
Reviews.Author: hortsey
Reviews.Content: Update: LONG story short...Amazon made it right (Thank You Amazon), but I'll never purchase another TV via online sales, nor will I purchase another LG product. I'd return this piece of junk, if I could! Had it less than 1 month ~ screen goes black! Let it sit for awhile, finally came back on. 1 week later, same thing! It finally comes back on, and now we have been without a screen for almost 10 days. And, customer service is of absolutely no help. Apparently NO ONE speaks English there, First tech couldn't get the notes correct, so the next technician puts through the run-around, only to find out that he's trying to solve a completely different problem. Once that is cleared up, I'm told we will put your ticket in and you should be getting a call from a service tech in the next 3 to 5 days!!! Are you kidding me??? I wish I had listened to the negative reviews on this one. There were reviews that said this would happen, and I of course thought they were just the Negative Nellies, that 1 in a million bad lemon of a TV. Ha!! That's what I get for doing my own thinking. I'm not sure what's the worst, the fact that a brand new TV goes black in less than 1 month, that NO one speaks English or that I have to wait so long for a possible phone call. UGH!!

Reviews.Title: Only one HDMI input!
Reviews.Author: TB "TB"
Reviews.Content: I guess I didn't read the fine print but I was quite surprised when we went to hook everything up that the 42LN5200 only has one HDMI input on the back...not even a second one on the side!  Grr!  What kind of TV in this "day and age" only has one HDMI input.  I wish I had read a bit closer.

Reviews.Title: No Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Lisa Woodkins
Reviews.Content: I thought I purchased a LG 50 inch smart tv.  It's ok for a tv just wasn't what I expected. :-(

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase.
Reviews.Author: Austin Woolridge
Reviews.Content: Got this for $440. Major steal. The quality is top notch, and unless you're a home theater fanatic the amount of outputs are enough. One of the best deals that I've ever come across.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: So I wanted to by my parents a TV for Christmas. They used to have an old 22in tube tv, it was quite old. Once I got this putting it together was very easy and hooking it was easy as well. Great picture and easy menus.The only bad thing that I noticed was that there is only one HDMI port, one HD components, and a cable in. For my parents that wasn't that big of a deal. Comcast is hooked up to the HDMI and the Xbox is connected via components so they can watch netflix. Other then that, there is slight glare if light is bright enough. The darker the room the better.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: James Carano
Reviews.Content: I wish it would have audio out so I can run through a surround sound system.  Good picture and easy set-up.

Reviews.Title: ONLY ONE HDMI!!!
Reviews.Author: Kasey Dittmeier
Reviews.Content: Everything was great except for the fact that it only has one hdmi port. I really wish I had known this before purchasing it. now I will either have to buy an hdmi switch will require yet another remote control to switch back and forth between cable box, video game console, and blu ray player, or I can manually go and plug in whatever I am choosing to watch/play. Not cool.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for the bedroom!
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: I wall mounted this TV in our master bedroom. This TV is perfect for the bedroom with a crystal clear picture!

Reviews.Title: TV worked for less than 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Terence A. Nyquist
Reviews.Content: We chose this TV because we thought it would be a good value for the money.  It worked for less than 2 weeks before it broke down and we had to call a repairman.  He replaced 2 panels in it.  Thankfully, it was under warranty.  It works fine now, but we're wondering how long it's going to keep working this time.  We wouldn't recommend this TV for that reason.

Reviews.Title: 42 Inch Model
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: This is a fairly basic model which i knew that when i bought it. It has 1 HDMI, 1 Component, and COAX. The picture is great but the reason i gave it 3 stars is because of the audio. Even at 100 it can still be hard to hear. With no actual audio output that limits the options.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: This product is exactly what we needed as a gift for a friend. UPS delivery was excellent and the product price was great.

Reviews.Title: nice tv, picture is ok
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Fox
Reviews.Content: The tv works with all my devices, it's doing well and was received in good order.could be more detailed and have more pictures, too. please sell an LG tv with more HDMI ports and mini 3.5 audio out as well, ok. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Terrific!
Reviews.Author: Debbie K
Reviews.Content: My first flat screen…easy set up, high quality, FREE shipping with "Prime" is the way to go!  I chose the 1 month trial but will keep it for continued FREE and FAST shipping - it more than pays for itself.  Oh, and the videos…TV and movies live streaming is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Your delivery company needs HELP
Reviews.Author: michelle boxler
Reviews.Content: The television itself is great. However the company you use to deliver people's item, that's a whole different story. I would think with people ordering from you as often as they do you would use a more known company. The company you used delivered my television to my neighbors house and finally when my neighbor got back into town, my television was finally found. I was told they had delivered my television to my house when indeed they did not.I hope with myself giving the television a good rate that you will figure you don't need to read my commit. You need touse UPS OR FEDEX, not some off the wall company who really dosent care. Also when a person is purchasing something that cost the amount that I paid you should make it to where it needs  to be signed for and not just placed in front of someone's front door especially during the holiday season when the box states perfectly what it is in the box.

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: ryan ringhofer
Reviews.Content: The TV was broke when we turned it on. Box was fine, TV itself looked fine until we turned it on. There was a spider web on the upper portion of screen.

Reviews.Title: 1 hdmi port
Reviews.Author: Kedron
Reviews.Content: The only downside to this tv is that it only has one hdmi port. Other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: madfran56
Reviews.Content: great gift, for my grandkids after theirs went out. they love their games and movies and gave the parents time.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Amanda S.
Reviews.Content: Awesome for the price, fits perfect in Tv center! Couldn't be happier with my first flat screen ever purchased.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Terrible TV
Reviews.Author: Ryan Dolbow
Reviews.Content: I bought the 47 inch LG during Black Friday sales as it was a very good price ($430 after tax). But just like with everything else in life, you get what you pay for. I set the TV up and turned on my Blu-ray player, as the player was powering up, I saw a black screen or what was supposed to look like black screen. There were several grey clouds on several areas of the screen (top right and lower left were the most obvious ones). I turned all the lights off in my room and put a couple of movies so I can see if this was going to be an issue. It most certainly was. Any time a scene took place at night or even a dark object was on screen; the grey spots were easily visible and were a major distraction. I spend the majority of my free time watching movies so this TV was most certainly not good enough for me. I didn't even bother doing anything else with it and returned it promptly to amazon. I will never buy another LG TV.

Reviews.Title: No Audio Output at all! No Audio Return Channel, No Digital Optical Audio Out
Reviews.Author: K. Hayes
Reviews.Content: If you are planning on using headphones, or speakers, or surround sound do not buy this model!! I called support to ask how to find the audio output and they said, "Sorry there isn't any!"  That's like buying a car and not having a radio.  For the price of this TV I expect at least the basic connections!  If someone says it has audio out, do not believe them! They have a different model than the 42LN5200.

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 42LN5200 42-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV
Reviews.Author: Mary' s e Books
Reviews.Content: problems with the ECO setting trying to override the chosen settings.  I would have chosen another set if I had known this before buying.

Reviews.Title: Will screen tilt on lg 47ln5200?
Reviews.Author: TED S.
Reviews.Content: Nice br tv nothing special! Does anyone know if you can tilt the screen back a bit? I have tried but do not want to break it !

Reviews.Title: Looks great!
Reviews.Author: mt
Reviews.Content: Just got this and love the size and the picture! Sharp picture - one of the best we've seen. And cannot beat the price!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed and tvless
Reviews.Author: Sean Hanss
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure how this television works. After buying it online during cyber Monday we received it a day late and completely busted. We immediately called Amazon to attempt to remedy the situation. After calling once and being placed directly on hold and then swiftly hung up on, we finally spoke to a woman and explained that we did not want a refund, we wanted the tv we had been so excited about only hours before. So she transferred us to the large items department, but not before issuing us a REFUND we did not want, unbeknownst to us. Because of this refund, rather than send us a replacement we have to reorder the tv and fight to get the price we originally paid. For all our trouble? What are we left with? A broken tv AND a $60 credit! This is my first and, more than likely, LAST transaction with Amazon.I understand that things sometimes break during shipping, but my disappointment comes from Amazon's complete failure to remedy the situation.That is all.

Reviews.Title: This TV has NO audio output jack for connecting to a stereo.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: This TV does not have an external audio output connector of any kind. No headphone jack. No other notable complaints

Reviews.Title: Low Price, Nice Picture!!
Reviews.Author: Robert B
Reviews.Content: The TV is an amazingly low price for the size, as long as you're not looking for too much functionality, given only the one HDMI port. It is only 60HZ so it isnt the fastest refreshing screen if you plan to watch hardcore sports on it but for everyday TV watching it is one of the best deals you can find!!

Reviews.Title: Display Failure
Reviews.Author: shah
Reviews.Content: I purchased this a little over a month ago, and just had a display failure. Essentially the screen went black, and now no images can be displayed. Seems like this might be a common issue with LG tv's. I would recommend purchasing something else. If I can get quick service I'll update this review, but at this point, I can't return it, and am waiting on LG for a response.Likely the issue seems to be blown capacitors? [...]Given that I've hardly used it, (maybe at most 20-30 hours over the (entire month and a half) this seems a bit ridiculous, but I'll wait to see what LG has to stay, and keep this updated.

Reviews.Title: LG Electronics 47LN5200 47-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV
Reviews.Author: Rosario Perez
Reviews.Content: I need warranty  LG Electronics 47LN5200 47-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV to claimto get right, faulted.in Venezuela. Caracas

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Jane Deardorff
Reviews.Content: Had to buy a tv for my daughter and this fit the bill without spending too much money and it arrived quickly.

Reviews.Title: Working as expected. Value for money
Reviews.Author: SOMASEKHAR G.
Reviews.Content: It is working as expected. Value for money. it is great one to have. It does not look like 42" tv.

Reviews.Title: Worst Amazon experience to date.
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I normally would not consider myself a stubborn person, but the time I've spent trying to salvage a, thus far, pleasant business relationship with Amazon is proving otherwise.I purchased this TV for an amazing Cyber Monday deal, by-passing Walmart, Best Buy, and TigerDirect. I received the TV and hooked it up only to be disappointed by it promptly malfunctioning. The TV would shut itself down after anywhere from 20 seconds to 20 minutes. The only way to turn the TV back on is to unplug it for a few seconds and then plug it back in.After spending a few hours trying to solve the problem myself... switching outlets, trying different combinations of sources, holding my left ear, wiggling my left foot... no luck. I spent more time on the web only to find out that it appears to be have some serious problems. I should have just boxed it back up and had it on the next UPS truck in the morning, but I thought, "I'm not that kind of consumer... It's under warranty. It just needs a little repair."The next morning after I spent another hour before work trying the TV some more (come on you all hope things magically fix themselves, too) I called LG customer support. We walked through the problem and arrange a time for a technician to come take a look. I would have to take a half day off work to be available for the technician. I should have just boxed it back up and had it on the next UPS truck that afternoon, but I thought, "I just had the unlucky misfortune of getting a lemon... the price I pay for a good deal and being able to shop in my pajamas."I took off work yesterday and let the technician examine the TV. When he realized it was brand new he said, "Wow, you should have just boxed this thing up and had them send you another one. Amazon has a 30 day policy." I told him I was content with having him fix it. I understand that once a malfunctioning part is replaced the unit should be in new condition. Good enough for me. The technician said that the problem was either a bad power supply or main board, both of which would require him to order the part, wait about a week for delivery, and reschedule a time for me to take another half day off work for him to repair the TV. He reiterated that I should just return the TV and get a replacement. I could have the TV sooner than he could repair it.After caving to the pressure of my wife, friends, coworkers, and now the TV technician, all of which have witnessed me spending a ridiculous amount of effort trying to turn a bad purchase from Amazon into a good one, I decided to start to the process of getting a replacement. (On a side note, a coworker decided to get one of the deals from Best Buy and he is loving rubbing his good experience in my face, telling me each and every movie or game he watched each night. Then he asks what I watched on the TV from Amazon and my whole department laughs) I go to the returns tab and discover "Replace" is grayed out. I click for more info and it said it's unavailable for replacement due to being out of stock, so I check myself. It is indeed in stock through a third party seller for $200 more than I paid for my paper weight, but the Cyber Monday TV for the low price is no longer available. The option for a refund is available but I don't necessarily want a refund. I want the TV I wasted Cyber Monday on. I should have just boxed it up and had it on the next UPS the next morning, but I thought, "No, this is Amazon. They will make this right. Who wouldn't?"I found an option to chat with a customer support rep so I decide to spend some more time to salvage this business relationship. After spending over an hour chatting with Amazon I discover that I'm out of luck. They are unwilling to honor the deal they offered. They advertised a functioning TV for a price. I paid that price. I received garbage instead of what I purchased and they will not provide what they advertised. I spent hours trying to get the TV to work. I spent hours researching the problem. I spent hours with LG customer support and tech support. I spent hours of PTO to be available for a technician. I spent hours dealing with Amazon customer support. I will be spending hours boxing this junk back up to ship to Amazon. I will be waiting days for a refund to be credited. And right now I'm going to be spending hours posting this review on every available social media outlet... and the only thing I get from Amazon is sorry for the inconvenience and be sure to check out their incredible deals next Cyber Monday.Way to go Amazon.

Reviews.Title: I loved it for four years....but afraid to purchase another
Reviews.Author: shoe fanatic
Reviews.Content: I have owned this model television for about four years.  All of a sudden it shuts itself on and off intermittently and sometimes I can't even watch the set anymore.  I tried so many different things, thinking I could fix it.  Finally I googled it, and it is all over the internet that LG tv's have bad chips and/or mother boards.  There was a class action law suit about this.  Unfortunately, for the consumer all of these t.v.'s will have varying problems and the experts indicate that we should not expect these t.v.'s to last beyond five years (three years if we're lucky).  I had to write this review, as I am on Amazon looking to replace this t.v. for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Package was damaged and TV screen broke
Reviews.Author: Uncle sam "yomama"
Reviews.Content: I will attempt to keep this G Rated. Package arrived damaged. The TV screen was also broke. Amazon would not replace the TV because they said it was now out of stock. So on Christmas morning I now have a broken TV and the extra bonus of having to ship it back and now go shop for another one. First time I have had trouble with Amazon and I hope it is the last. I don't know if it was damaged prior to leaving Amazon or if it was damaged during shipping but when it arrived it was clearly damaged so I took photos prior to opening package. Hopefully the refund process goes smoother than the purchasing! If it sounds too good to be true (Price) it probably is. Don't waste your time buying a TV from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: This is not a Smart Tv!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sasha Mariah Lane Spencer
Reviews.Content: I bought this LG 50LN5200 50-inch tv thinking it was a smart tv since it said it was in the description. IT IS NOT A SMART TV! It does have a good picture and that's about it. The sound is okay but not the best. But I got a good deal on it on cyber Monday so I'm going to keep it.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy a TV from Amazon! Arrived broken and Amazon will not replace
Reviews.Author: Matt LeStrange
Reviews.Content: Buying this TV has been the worst experience I have ever had with amazon an I will cancel my Amazon Prime when it is time to renew and avoid ordering from here again.I ordered this TV on Cyber Monday for $200 less than it is now, with 2 day shipping with Prime. I thought I was getting a great deal!Then it didn't ship for 2 days, so the delivery got pushed back a day ( I get it, the holidays are busy for all the retailers). But then UPS said it was left at the warehouse or maybe it fell off the truck because the box was all dented and taped back together when it finally arrived (4 days later). Of course the screen was completely broken and when I went on amazon for a replacement that option was no longer there since it is only sold by third party now. If it had arrived on time, there probably would have been replacements still available. When I called they said that I could get oCosmo TV as a replacement, since they were no longer selling this LG TV. One of the customer service reps said they would credit me an extra $10 (which I have yet to see), because that would make up for the $200 in savings that I lost out on, instead of buying this elsewhere on Cyber Monday for only $30 more.Returning it was even more of a pain, it took several emails and calls to get a shipping label, so I could drop it back off to UPS. Instead they tried to schedule UPS and CEVA shipping to pick it up, so I could wait around for a 4 hour window and then not have UPS show up. After UPS said they would be there between 12:15-4:15pm on 3 consecutive day, they finally showed up during the window, after I had already called to cancel the pick up and dropped it off at a UPS store.At this point I got my refund and I will be looking elsewhere for a TV, but likely will not find a deal this good.

Reviews.Title: The picture quality is not as good as expected.  The brightness is low.
Reviews.Author: Gaynor Gremillion
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is not as good as expected.  The brightness is low.  Made adjustments but still darker than expected.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied - Unable to connect external speakers
Reviews.Author: Manik
Reviews.Content: Unable to attache external speakers . Dont see 3.5 MM jack with the TV . Also , the RCA pins didnot work to connect to speakers .

Reviews.Title: Laim tv
Reviews.Author: pablo navia
Reviews.Content: Doesn't have audio output and has only one hdmi hate it hate it hate it hate it hate it hate it hate I. Hate it

Reviews.Title: LG 42" TV Defect
Reviews.Author: Melvin Greenblatt
Reviews.Content: This tv has only a single HDMI  output. This is not adequate because if you want to hook up two or three HD devices such as a Roku and a DVD player as well as a HD receiver set top box you must buy an expensive "splitter" that adds considerably to the cost of the TV.

Reviews.Title: No component audio out
Reviews.Author: Jim Holman
Reviews.Content: According to the manual I downloaded from LG, this series has only digital optical audio out, no component audio out. So if you plan to hook up an older receiver to it, you are out of luck

Reviews.Title: No reviews here are for this TV
Reviews.Author: Ann Decker
Reviews.Content: I'm disappointed that none of the reviews here are actually for this TV, but for smaller models. So the reviews are useless for me to evaluate this specific model.

Reviews.Title: BAD TV AND COMPANY
Reviews.Author: R. Sutton
Reviews.Content: To warn you, my LG tv lasted only I year and four months.  Don't buy this brand of tv or electronics.

Reviews.Title: Thumbs down on LG customer Service
Reviews.Author: Frank Giannotti
Reviews.Content: I had purchased the TV to use as a message board and checked the specifications to make sure it was PC compatible. In the specs it failed to mention that the TV did not have the Common VGA port that 99% of all PC's have, but instead uses HDMI technology. Basically I called customer service which apparently is out-sourced to another country to get some technical support on to adapt it to my PC and what setting to use. The technician was not even remotely helpful and kept insisting that there was nothing wrong with the TV and that I needed to contact my computer manufacturer. I asked to talk to a supervisor and he was even worse. LG stands for Life is good for the company, not so good for the consumer.
